title: Textured anti-reflection and down-conversion composite functional films for high-efficiency solar cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20191-20198
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03397C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sijia Jin, Shengxuan Wang, Hailong Feng, Darren He, Alex Hsu, Zhenxing Du, Wei Sun, Haiyan He, Chunhui Shou, Shien Sun, Deren Yang, Lei Wang
A composite functional film with a random positive-pyramidal light-trapping structure and down-conversion capabilities has been prepared by the soft nanoimprint technique to enhance light utilization for solar cells.
